name: IMFB
description:
IMFB is inspired by classic puzzle platformers like Super Monkey Ball and Marble Madness. Roll up all the collectables on each stage while trying to get the best time!

IMFB is best played with a controller.

IMFB was developed in three weeks by Lucas and Max at Jet Drift studio.

Contact us at jetdriftstudio@gmail.com

Feedback is welcome!
